description.narrative: The project development objective is to strengthen the financial and institutional capacity of the Deposit Insurance Agency, so as to enable it to meet its deposit insurance and bank resolution obligations and serve as a core part of financial sector safety net.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Para. 1, Section IA of Schedule 2 | Description :The Borrower shall maintain the Project Implementing Entitywith the necessary resources to carry out the Project, and with a composition and terms of reference satisfactory to the Bank. |Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Para. 2, Section IA of Schedule 2 | Description :The Borrower shall cause the Project Implementing Entity tomaintain the PIT at all times during Project implementation with resources and responsibilities satisfactory to the World Bank,including procurement and financial management, and with competent staff inadequate numbers. | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Para. 3, Section IA of Schedule 2 | Description :The Borrower shall cause the Project Implementing Entity tocarry out the Project in accordance with the Project Operations Manual,and shall not, and shall cause the Project ImplementingEntity to not amend or waive any provision thereto without the Bank's priorwritten approval. In case of any conflict between theterms of the Project Operations Manual and the Agreement, the Agreement shall prevai | Frequency :CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement :Para. 4, Section IIB of Schedule 2 | Description :In the event that in any given calendar year the DIF Assetsbecome less than the sum of Transfers to the DIF made pursuant to this Agreement, the Borrower shall ensure that each audit reportshall confirm that the difference is justified by: payments in an equivalent amount made by the Project Implementing Entity tofulfill its deposit insurance and bank resolution obligations, in accordancewith | Frequency :CONTINUOUS
